title: League of Legends is feminist/sjw/blm/antifa now
body:
This started in 2018, the reason why they are suspending people, banning people for saying facts. And calling out feeders, trollers. Is because the owner of riot/the people that work at riot. Are feminist/sjw/blm/antifa fact, some of them that is. If you do your research you will find out, what I did. I will not spend money on league of legends.


This is the reason why feeders/trollers are not getting suspended, but people like me. That call them out are, again this started in 2018.


One evidence is the changing of a straight man to homosexual (Varus).
